*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ben R. Milam to Austin, March 30, 1827. Distressed at exclusion of slavery and at the admission of the Shawnee Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-30-1827">March 30th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir I received your favor by *person_mentioned*Mr Cortis*/person_mentioned* and am much conserned in consequence of the many troubles and difficulties that appear to oppose the colonizing sistem*/p*
*p*The manner in which the *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*question is desided will be a grait objection to the *person_mentioned*American population*/person_mentioned* and I fear will put a Suden stop to that population, that would be benificial to *person_mentioned*Embroserios [empresarios.]*/person_mentioned* The *person_mentioned*shawnies */person_mentioned*you say is admited by an order of the Governor to become *person_mentioned*setlers*/person_mentioned*, and I understand it corectly they have all the privaleges of other *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*in cais they cultivait the soil. If this be the cais we may bid adue to our antisapated pleasure for *person_mentioned*society */person_mentioned*never will improve under those circumstances*/p*
*p*As it respects the commercial arangement I was not able to do aneything definait I converst with *person_mentioned*Jas W Zacharia*/person_mentioned* he I believe would Enter in to the business if he was sertain the *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*was well acquainted with the Mercantile business*/p*
*p*I am of the opinion that it would be well for *person_mentioned*John Austin */person_mentioned*to visit *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*give to *person_mentioned*Zacharia */person_mentioned*a fool [full] description of the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* and the prospects of traid and I have no doubt but he would advans to aney amount that would be required*/p*
*p*I only spent three days in *location_mentioned*Neworleans */location_mentioned*and had not an opertunity of completing the hole of my business and had not a decisive answer on yours whil in *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*I received leter from *person_mentioned*wavell */person_mentioned*as lait as the *date_mentioned n="12-30-1826">30 of December*/date_mentioned* he has much dificulty in making his aragements but says he will leave in a few weaks for this plais.*/p*
*p*As it respects the Extention of *location_mentioned*teritory */location_mentioned*I believe it has all blown over as there has been nothing said on the subject through the hole sesión of *person_mentioned*congress*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I leave this in the *date_mentioned n="03-31-1827">morning */date_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*pecoun pint [Pecan Point]*/location_mentioned*. A little Tristy in consiquens of the inducements Extended to the *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*by the Government. I feare they will be a little troublesom to the *location_mentioned*setelments */location_mentioned*but I will distroy Every thing like discord as fair as is in my power and hope for a chainge a spedy chainge for the better*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Ben E Milam*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Give my respects to all *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and write as often as you have opertunity—the *person_mentioned*fredonians */person_mentioned*is all here rather under the wether [Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San philipa de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
